    • verifyTitle

      @Then("I verify the (?:tab|window)( does not)? (has|have|contains?) the title text \"([^\"]*)\"$") public static void verifyTitle​(java.lang.String assertion, java.lang.String matchType, java.lang.String titleText)
      Checks if the current tab or window either does or does not equal or contain the passed text
      Parameters:
      assertion - String whether the title should or should not have the text
      matchType - String whether the title should exactly equal or contains
      titleText - String the title text to verify
